title: Burst of Pure Light
description: A story of a typical family. Father Mother and two normal happy adventurous teenage daughters. They have the opportunity to spend a holiday in and around the Far East. They are immediately exposed and dragged into a world of crime and corruption. The girls have a strange experience with people from our distant future. After this they are blessed with wonderful powers and return to their own time.The girls have wonderful personalities and with these powers brings about the most desirable conclusion. Quite a light hearted, nail biting thriller for all the family.
author: Jeffery P. Coit
